university2.thesis: Thesis on 'Developing a SPA with Chat and Pong Game Integration: A Full Stack Web Application'.

certificates.cert: 42 Programming School Certificate of Successfully Completing Core Curriculum

projects.overview: These projects have equipped me with a robust understanding of programming fundamentals, problem-solving, and advanced technical concepts in various domains, including systems programming, web development, and cybersecurity.

items.name: libft
items.purpose: Recreated the standard C library functions from scratch.

items.name: ft_printf
items.purpose: Implemented a custom printf function to mimic the standard printf.

items.name: get_next_line
items.purpose: Developed a function to read lines from a file efficiently.

items.name: push_swap
items.purpose: Created an algorithm to sort two stacks using sorting algorithms like insertion sort.

items.name: pipex
items.purpose: Implemented command forking and piping using system calls.

items.name: Philosophers
items.purpose: Solved the dining philosophers problem using multithreading.

items.name: minishell
items.purpose: Created a functional shell that mimics Bash shell features.

items.name: NetPractice
items.purpose: Explored networking concepts such as MAC addresses and IP configurations.

items.name: born2beroot
items.purpose: Configured a Debian Linux server on VirtualBox to enhance OS knowledge.

items.name: Inception
items.purpose: Learned and implemented Docker concepts, including creating Docker images and containers for nginx, WordPress, and MariaDB.

items.name: CPPModules
items.purpose: Started exploring Object-Oriented Programming and STL containers.

items.name: webserv
items.purpose: Created a web server implementing HTTP using socket programming.

items.name: Cub3d
items.purpose: Built a basic 3D game engine using raycasting.

items.name: ft_transcendence
items.purpose: Created a single-page application with chat and multiplayer game features.

items.name: Visual Studio Resume
items.purpose: Built a dynamic resume using React.js.

items.name: Python for Data Science
items.purpose: Currently learning data science concepts using Python.

items.name: Cybersecurity Piscine
items.purpose: Worked on multiple projects including hidden services (TOR), metadata analysis, reverse engineering, and developing a local malware program.
